document_data.mainbody:
zu was a blind master smith from the Silver Marches who worked for the Harpers until his dying breath, sometime before 1373 DR.
After spending years forging enchanted weapons and armor for his Harper allies, Izu died after a brutal winter that ravaged the region. Only after his death was the smiths affiliation with the Harpers discovered by his family. The smiths heirs gifted his prized possession â€“ Izus hammer of fabrication, to a young Harper agent Izu was especially fond of.
